mapper.select: SELECT R.NO as rentalNo, S.TITLE as reviewPlaceName, R.REVIEWCONTENT as reviewContent, R.REVIEWSCORE as reviewScore, R.REVIEWUPDATEDATE as reviewUpdateDate, R.FILEPATH as reviewFilePath FROM RENTAL R, SHARE S WHERE R.USER_ID = #{param1} AND R.PLACE_NO = S.PLACE_NO AND REVIEWSUBMITDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY R.REVIEWSUBMITDATE DESC LIMIT #{param2}, #{param3}
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalPage FROM RENTAL R, SHARE S WHERE R.USER_ID = #{param1} AND R.PLACE_NO = S.PLACE_NO AND REVIEWSUBMITDATE IS NOT NULL

SELECT S.TITLE as reviewPlaceName, R.REVIEWCONTENT as reviewContent, R.REVIEWSCORE as reviewScore, R.REVIEWUPDATEDATE as reviewUpdateDate, R.FILEPATH as reviewFilePath FROM RENTAL R, SHARE S WHERE R.NO = #{param1} AND R.PLACE_NO = S.PLACE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE RENTAL SET REVIEWCONTENT = #{param1}, REVIEWSCORE = #{param2}, FILEPATH = #{param3}, REVIEWUPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE NO = #{param4}
UPDATE RENTAL SET REVIEWSUBMITDATE = NULL, REVIEWREMOVEDATE = NOW() WHERE NO = #{param1}
